name: Horsin'Around 4
description: Ladies and gentlemen, warm welcome into the jockey establishment. Horsin’ Around is a plain but gainful Web3 Horse Racing platform. Project has a place only for risk-takers, the ones who can become the part of the fastest growing and competitive horse racing ecosystem. Introducing a collection of 3,335 purebreds. Horsin’ Around is the home of 3,333 Sham the Racers and 2 the most exceptional and rare sprinters, Secretariat the Golden Crown, and Bubble Gum the Rainbow Tail. Each horse has different powers and skills that help them to win the contest.
